backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: JSON feature evidence report referencing removal of the date‑range UI block in ExperienceSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists brief summaries of various frontend CV components, data modules, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting the React root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all CV sections, applying SEO, and rendering a personalized footer.
frontend/src/components/cv/ContactSectio: Renders a grid of contact methods with icons and links, including updated Google Drive label.
frontend/src/components/cv/EducationSect: Displays education entries with degree, institution, dates, location, and bullet‑point details.
frontend/src/components/cv/ExperienceSec: Renders a timeline of experience entries without the date‑range UI block and supports optional location.
frontend/src/components/cv/HeroSection.t: Hero banner showing profile photo, name, title, location, summary, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/cv/ProjectsSecti: Displays project cards with descriptions, technologies, and links to demos and GitHub code.
frontend/src/components/cv/Section.tsx: Reusable wrapper component providing consistent section layout and titles.
frontend/src/components/cv/SkillsSection: Renders categorized skills using tag‑style badges within a styled grid.
frontend/src/components/cv/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll-based active section highlighting and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/data/cv.ts: Defines CV-related TypeScript interfaces and provides static CV data including hero, experience, education, skills, projects, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required for the CV site.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoFromCvData.ts: Updates document title and meta tags for SEO and social sharing using CV data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark themes with an earthy color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata containing state, issues, and feature definitions for build and deployment tracking.
